item.source: How do u create a Moparscape Server?

item.title: How do u create a Moparscape Server?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Matt Sir Matt
item.description:
@Sir_Matt wrote:

[HAMACHI GUIDE]
1.Download Hamachi from here http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php
2.Once Downloaded Open it up and then you will be asked to create a name and pass (create 1)
3.Once you have created one you will see a little triangular icon click it and there will be an option to create a network or join a network. If you wish to join another server you click join network.
4.Then it will ask you for the username and password you MUST enter the persons username and password then straight after that you should be connected.
5.If you want people to join your server then you can create as many user name and password as you can (E.G. -Username:Crown Password:1234) you can then make more and more so more people can Join your server so after that you could create Crown1 with the same pass and keep goin on.
[Guide created by King2006]

Read full topic
